Package com.xebisco.yield

Class Component

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.YldB
com.xebisco.yield.Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
Animator, AudioPlayer, SimpleRenderable, Transform, YldScript
public abstract class Component extends YldB
This class is a script for Entities, and is made to modify them.

    • onCollisionEnter

      public void onCollisionEnter(Entity colliding, Vector2 collisionNormal)
      This function is called when this entity collides with another entity.
      Parameters:
      colliding - The entity that is colliding with this entity.
      collisionNormal - The normal of the collision.

    • rayCast

      public RayCast rayCast(Entity requestEntity, Vector2 point1, Vector2 point2)
      > This function returns a RayCast object that contains information about the first entity that was hit by a ray cast from point1 to point2
      Parameters:
      requestEntity - The entity that is requesting the raycast. This is used to determine if the raycast should hit the entity that is requesting it.
      point1 - The starting point of the ray.
      point2 - The end point of the ray.
      Returns:
      A RayCast object.

    • update

      public void update(float delta)
      Called on every frame of the scene.
      Specified by:
      update in class YldB
      Parameters:
      delta - The time variation between the last frame and the actual one in seconds.
